achievements: Known for his expressive and emotionally powerful paintings.
His masterpiece, the Isenheim Altarpiece, is considered a landmark of Northern Renaissance art.
Known as 'Matthias the Just' for his fair rule.
Patron of the arts and sciences, establishing the Corvinian Library.
Considered one of the greatest Austrian footballers of all time.
Led Austria to victory in the 1932 Central European International Cup.
Co-founder of cell theory, stating that all plants are composed of cells.
Contributed significantly to the understanding of plant physiology.
